New Records: Rahmanullah Gurbaz and Ibrahim Zadran stitched a record partnership of 154 to help Afghanistan post 183/5 against Uganda
Key Match Events: Fazalhaq Farooqi took 5 wickets for 9 runs in his spell
Rashid Khan and Naveen-ul-Haq chipped in with a couple while Mujeeb-Ur-Rahman took a solitary wicket
Rashid Khan wrapped up proceedings with a double whammy and Uganda are bundled out for just 58 runs
Bilal Hassan is hit on the pads for the upteenth time and the finger goes up for LBW
Pre-Game Insights: Rashid Khan, the captain of Afghanistan says that this is the kind of start they wanted as a team and it is all about the mindset and applauds the openers and then praises the bowling as well
Post-Match Reflections: Brian Masaba, the skipper of Uganda says that it was pretty special to see their flag and the national anthem at the World Cup
Fazalhaq Farooqi is the Player of the Match for his stellar five-wicket haul
Miscellaneous Highlights: Afghanistan were sent into bat first and they made 183 for 5 on the back of attacking 70s from Ibrahim Zadran and Rahmanullah Gurbaz
Uganda came back brilliantly with the ball but were not in the contest at all with the bat
